'You can now be part of the Planet Coaster universe! Your avatar will be seen by Steam friends and other Planet Coaster players.

key: You can edit the avatar appearance later.'

translation: 'A Family group must contain between one to two adults and one to four children.'

key: Would you like to open the editor?'

translation: 'Your Avatar will be sent to our servers for moderation.

key: It may take some time to appear.'

translation: 'Please ensure each member of your group is named.'
'Embark on a career in theme park management. Complete varied and increasingly challenging scenarios and see how far you can go!'

'Start your park with limited money and build that dream park in this lush environment!'

'Start your park with limited money and build on a sandy expanse!'

key: Position your avatar anywhere on the globe. You can edit your avatar HQ position later.

translation: 'You need to be at least level {Value:int} to unlock this level.'
'Failed to load the selected save game'
'Start a new park on a fresh slate and let your imagination go wild! You are free to build your dream park with no restrictions!'
'Coasters! Building increasingly difficult coasters to satisfy the Coaster King.'

column3: and restricted planning permission grants you the opportunity to create a unique park in this hollowed out habitat!  Building above the cavern is strictly prohibited
column5: so you’ll need to conquer the depths to ensure this venture is a success.'

translation: 'They said no one could build a theme park at Molly's Gully. Prove them wrong! Keep below the height restriction and bankroll the construction of a colossal coaster!'
'The enormous golem's rampage has finally come to an end
column3: frozen in eternal battle against the M.U.T.T.s. Our experts claim the creature is dormant
column4: but local staff don't seem convinced; they're demanding a premium to work here! Utilise the monorail to make the most of the space and create a truly unique sci-fi theme park.'

translation: 'Rumours of engineers meeting sticky ends scared off this park's staff
column3: leading to its recent sale. The bargain price presents an irresistible opportunity
column5: complete construction of the park and ignore the reports of strange noises underground. I'm sure it's nothing to worry about...'

translation: 'A strange object found in the desert appears to have exerted an unexpected effect on the park’s rides – everything keeps breaking down and we’re running out of cash. Hire some mechanics
column3: utilise work rosters to fix and maintain the rides
column4: combat the Monolith’s power and get the park back in profit.'

translation: 'The government recently sold off a tract of restricted land to private buyers
column3: which was promptly snapped up by an ambitious theme park operation. Shortly after their grand opening
column4: this sci-fi themed park's management mysteriously disappeared
column5: along with all their research. Keep this park in the black
column6: earn enough to research new rides and make this strange park a success.'

translation: 'You'll need to be at the top of your game for this one! The former owners have abandoned this park and left it in a real mess; negative cash reserves
column3: a huge loan to pay off
column5: and some seriously inefficient amusement rides. If you can turn this around it'll be a miracle.'

translation: 'This futuristic park's shop franchisors have questioned their long term commitment after underwhelming financial results. Retain their trust by squeezing as much profit as possible from your shops and facilities. Layout and pricing choices are key
column3: and canny tycoons will make use of the ready-built shopfronts.'
and welcome to Planet Coaster! Shiver those timbers and take charge of this explosive pirate park. Complete ride construction
column4: draw in the crowds and give your guests a swashbuckling good time!'

translation: 'Former Pirate turned entrepreneur Peg-Leg Pete appears to be struggling somewhat; his loan-addled park is incomplete and lacking in fun (if only he could remember where he buried his treasure... It was around here somewhere). Take the helm and turn things around before this ship capsizes!'

column3: rising from the earth in search of vengeance
column4: I reckon. Some say it’s cursed but all I know is that it makes people unhappy. We need your help to counteract the skull’s effect or the park will never recover. Keep guests happy and keep them in the park. Hire entertainers
column6: do what you gotta do to keep the money coming in.'

translation: 'The Silversmith family are opening a theme park in the grounds of their estate to tackle their runaway debts. Your job is to build a successful park and keep the place afloat
column3: with just a few caveats... The Silversmiths are rather old fashioned and will only allow ‘traditional’ attractions
column4: so you may want to aim your Marketing efforts at families and ensure your ride sequences offer value for money. Oh
column6: as the estate will take a percentage of any refunds... Good luck!'

translation: 'They say this tree is the heart of the world. Can you respect mother nature and craft an eco-friendly theme park around the towering tree
column3: or will you sell the woodland for profit and squeeze as much as you can from this verdant environment?'

translation: 'It’s time to unwrap our plans for a festive-themed park in this jolly location. Just remember that your cash is a loan
column3: not a gift! Spruce up your winter wonderland with seasonal scenery and draw in the merry crowds from far around.'

translation: 'Bring some cheer to the Festive King Coaster'
'Can your skills impress the King of Coasters?'
'Plunder through these scenarios with Lockjaw. Arrrrr you ready?'
'Princess Amelie requests your aid in revitalising her kingdom.'
'You need to be at least level {Value:int} to unlock this level.'
'You'll need to manage your money to succeed in this mode. You'll have limited options to begin with until you earn your way to a bigger park.'
'Customise a member of staff to appear in other players' games.'
'Enjoy the fantastic world of Planet Coaster
column3: discover endless possibilities and make the ultimate theme park.'

column3: you're just a few small steps away from experiencing the world of Planet Coaster!

key: First we'll create an avatar of yourself to represent your amazing creations among the Planet Coaster community.
Make sure to create someone your friends will recognise!'
